description: A runescape app that works! awesome!
Both versions seem to work really well. Thank you.
Great app! works well and comes with all versions
just one question is there a way to save the 2MB it always downloads on boot?
summary: really happy with this snap its a lot better than the runebox one

description: This does work perfectly and is what I've been using for the past few months, however Jagex have now updated their client and download so that the official client works on Linux, it's probably worth moving to that now.
Login here and get keylogged ya newbs
Home run on creation of this app especially combining the two. Smooth operation and dependable every time. Fantastic program.

Spent my RS3 journey to max on Windows because I could use my beefy desktop. Tried RS3 on Mac, but didn't like the performance using my dinky Macbook. I only knew of the flatpak version of RS3, but I had graphical issues with that. This snap runs without any issues for me and allows me to use my desktop. One step closer to deleting Windows. Thank you!
Because I used this Launcher, my Account got banned

This is the only RS app that works for me. Jagex's native application for Linux hasn't ever worked for me. Last time I had an issue I posted on the RS forums and James Carroll (the developer of this app) pointed me in the right direction (aka towards this app) and I haven't had any issues since. He maintains this app very well and is super helpful!

The only hiccup I've ever had with this app is when you try to do a fresh installation and Jagex has some issue on their end. I waited a week and the installation works again. Once again to reiterate, this isn't Carroll's fault, but Jagex's. This app is awesome.
summary: The only RS launcher that works! Better than Jagex's native Linux app

description: Finally a linux RS launcher that just works!
